trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService"></xref> that was used prior to the current version.

When an assembly containing a new version of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> implementation is deployed, this attribute is applied to the new version of the tracking service class to identify the assembly of the previous version.

This allows the runtime to utilize the newer tracking service for workflows that were using persisted while using the previous version of the tracking service, but resumed after the new version was implemented.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a fully qualified assembly name that identifies the previous version of the tracking service.
Gets the fully qualified assembly name of the previous version tracking service that this version replaces.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the fully qualified assembly name.
